00025 #ifndef _BASE_TESTCASE_
00026 #define _BASE_TESTCASE_

00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/TestSuite>

00032 namespace base {

00035   
00036 class TestCase : public TestInterface
00037 {
00038 public:
00039   TestCase(const String& name ) : TestInterface(name) {}
00040   
00041   virtual String className() const { return String("TestCase"); }
00042   
00043   
00044 };
00045 
00046 
00047 #define BEGIN_TEST_CASE( test_case_name ) \
00048   \
00049   class ATestCase : public TestCase \
00050   { \
00051     virtual String className() const { return String("ATestCase"); } \
00052     \
00053     ATestCase() \
00054      : TestCase(test_case_name) \
00055     { \
00056       thisTest = ref<ATestCase>( this ); \
00057       TestSuite::tests.push_back( thisTest ); \
00058     } \
00059     \
00060     virtual void runTests(ref<TestResults> results) { \
00061       bool success = true; \
00062       try { \
00063         setUp(); \
00064       } catch (std::exception& e) { \
00065         results->addResult( getName(), false ); \
00066         return; \
00067       } \
00068       \
00069       Int t=0; \
00070       try { \
00071         while (testMethods[t].method_name != (char*)(0)) { \
00072           (this->*testMethods[t].method)(); \
00073           t++; \
00074         } \
00075       } catch (std::exception& e) { \
00076         success = false; \
00077       } \
00078       try { \
00079         tearDown(); \
00080       } catch (std::exception&e) {} \
00081       \
00082       results->addResult( getName(), success); \
00083     } \
00084     
00085     
00086 #define BEGIN_TEST_METHODS \
00087     typedef void (ATestCase::*method_ptr)(); \
00088     \
00089     struct MethodInfo { \
00090       method_ptr method; \
00091       char*      method_name; \
00092     }; \
00093     \
00094     static MethodInfo testMethods[]; \
00095     static ref<ATestCase> thisTest; \
00096   }; \
00097   \
00098   ATestCase::MethodInfo ATestCase::testMethods[] = { 
00099     
00100     
00101 #define TEST_METHOD( method_name ) \
00102       { &ATestCase::method_name, #method_name }, 
00103 
00104     
00105 #define END_TEST_METHODS \
00106       { &ATestCase::setUp, 0 }, \
00107       { &ATestCase::tearDown, 0 } \
00108     };
00109     
00110     
00111 #define END_TEST_CASE \
00112   ref<ATestCase> ATestCase::thisTest = ref<ATestCase>( NewObj ATestCase() ); 
00113   
00114 
00115 } // base
00116 
00117 #endif
